translated: the weak man strikes the weak.
The good man defeats the good,
the bad man defeats the bad.
This is the kind of king he is,
so turn the chariot around, charioteer.”

analyzed: akkodhena jine kodha  asādhum sādhunā jine
translated: “With non-anger one conquers anger,🔽with good one conquers bad.
This is the kind of king he is,
so turn the chariot around, charioteer.”
The Birth Story of the King’s Speech, the first.
